projects.name: Fibabanka Video Onboarding Project
projects.summary:
This project offers those who want to become customers of the Fibabanka, without going to the branch, and becoming Fibabanka customers through the mobile application. My responsibilities in this project involve;


- Building the architecture of the project
- Forming a sustainable and maintainable codebase.
- Safely transferring the sensitive information 
- Taking initiative in the subjects of UI/UX
- Working on project analysis and scheduling meetings with stakeholders.
- Ensuring that the application works stably on various mobile devices.
- Creating the React-Native bridge modules for NFC SDK, FaceMatch SDK and Realtime Video Call SDK and providing the implementation of these SDKs.

projects.name: İski Android App
projects.summary:
This Android app contains various operations related with ISKI (Istanbul Water and Sewerage Administration) that contains:
* Dam water levels and detailed statistics for every dam based date,
* E-şube section  which allows to pay invoices,
* Failure/shortage section about water related problems,
* Quick payment section which contains barcode scanner. Therefore, users can scans barcode from their invoices and app instantly navigates to payment page about that user,
* Failure record section which gets water related failures from user and sends to İSKİ,
* FAQ section,
*  Branches section which has branch contact info and another related information,
* YÖM (Authorized payment centers) section, which has YÖM contact info,
* Bids and contact info serction.

projects.name: JAX-RS and JAX-WS Projects
projects.summary: Miscellaneous SOAP and REST services that runs on Weblogic servers.

projects.name: Water/Natural Gas Metering Android App for İSKİ & İGDAŞ Institutions
projects.summary:
This Android app collects information from water and natural gas counters belongs to subscribers and prints invoice from bluetooth printer. Counter reader users can login with their credentials and then can receive daily counter jobs as batch. Users can read counters sequentially (or directly via counter installment number or barcode scanning) and enter counter value to app. When user taps to operate accrual button, app sends counter info to our server and receives back with invoice info. Afterwards,  app generates CPCL code from that invoice info and sends encoded data to bluetooth Zebra printer. If network is unreliable, user can move counter data to queue. Therefore when network becomes reliable, user can operate queue data as batch. 
When counter is broken or counter value not readable, user can take picture of that counter as evidence to counter has been read. Counter pictures can send to server concurrently via Android IntentService. 
Counter reader chiefs can send message within Web app to counter reader users for some urgent cases. In this situation, Android app gets message and show to user as notification.
Android app can be updated remotely without Google Play Store. App checks periodically if new version relased, and then downloads apk file and installs new version.

projects.name: Personnel Directory Cordova App
projects.summary: With this project, managers can view another personnel information such as name, born date/location, date of employment, education level, seniority status, contact info etc. Managers can send email and also save personnel info to their phone directory directly within this app. Furthermore, they can display and get directions to personnel residing place location. Because of project implemented as Cordova App, can work on Android, iOS, Web and any other Cordova compatible platforms.

projects.name: bimtel.com.tr
projects.summary: I created website design from PSD file and integrated to Bootstrap. Therefore, users can visit this site from their phones, tables and PC's responsively. I also prepared site contents and textual data to introduce company technologies.

projects.name: Hosgeldin.biz
projects.summary:
This project implements Physical Web to provide beacon device management on web app and interacted mobile services. Users can create beacon devices within web app and upload contents for campaigns, sales and any other operations to encourage people. When any person enters the beacon  area, mobile app detects that beacon via Bluetooth and creates notification, plays music, displays video, navigates web page to supporting that campaign. 
Project consists three parts: ASP MVC Web App, Android & iOS app. I worked on entire web app and various parts of the Android project.

projects.name: Logo Tiger 3 (ERP) Integration to BackOffice
projects.summary: This Web project integrated on our back office web pages. In this ASP MVC app, user can view payment related operations that connected with Logo Tiger ERP system. Integration with ERP implemented with Lobjects.dll which can connects ERP system and can query operations.
